mapper.sql: wcap.id as id, wcap.wine_cellar_activity_id as wine_cellar_activity_id, wcap.prod_id as prod_id, wcap.prod_sku_id as prod_sku_id, wcap.winery_voucher_id as winery_voucher_id, wcap.present_type as present_type, wcap.winery_voucher_inst as winery_voucher_inst, wcap.return_amt as return_amt, wcap.present_remark as present_remark, wcap.sort as sort, wcap.create_date as create_date, wcap.modify_date as modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into b_wine_cellar_activity_prod (id, wine_cellar_activity_id, prod_id, prod_sku_id, winery_voucher_id, present_type, winery_voucher_inst, return_amt, present_remark, sort, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id}, #{wineCellarActivityId}, #{prodId}, #{prodSkuId}, #{wineryVoucherId}, #{presentType}, #{wineryVoucherInst}, #{returnAmt}, #{presentRemark}, #{sort}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
update b_wine_cellar_activity_prod
wine_cellar_activity_id = #{wineCellarActivityId},
prod_id = #{prodId},
prod_sku_id = #{prodSkuId},
winery_voucher_id = #{wineryVoucherId},
present_type = #{presentType},
winery_voucher_inst = #{wineryVoucherInst},
return_amt = #{returnAmt},
present_remark = #{presentRemark},
sort = #{sort},
create_date = #{createDate},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
where id = #{id}
